main event: On 12 September 1948, Mr. Harold H. Wright observed a bright green fireball in Moffatt, Colorado, accompanied by Mr. Funk.
interesting points: The fireball was described as bright green and soundless., It was observed on three separate occasions in Colorado., The fireball appeared to be brighter and closer during the second sighting on 5 December 1948., On the last sighting, on 22 December 1948, Mr. Wright was with Mr. Charles Silliott., Radio reports indicated similar fireball sightings in the Oklahoma area on 31 January 1949.
witness description: Mr. Harold H. Wright and Mr. Funk, a teacher.
